name: Rotao
blurb: Rotao is a puzzle-adventure game that offers a life-like touch interface, perfect for play on iPhone, Android and tablet platforms.

rewards.reward: "In The Loop" :: Stay informed with privileged access to our developer blog, plus e-mail notification when Rotao is nearing release, and get an exclusive digitally delivered "Backer Copy" of Rotao.  Note: Backers of all higher rewards are also "In The Loop".

"First Episode" :: Experience the first full Episode of Rotao - hours of additional content delivered incrementally over the course of the first few months following release.  Even better, you'll be able to get a single copy on any platform we deliver to.

"Autographed Art" :: Receive a professionally printed concept art poster, autographed by the development team and delivered to you by some unknown third party.  In addition, you'll be in the loop and get a copy of Rotao on each phone or tablet platform we deliver to.

"Backer T" :: Show your support proudly with a Rotao Backer T-shirt and enjoy playing the game on any platform we release it on.  In addition, if we ever see you wearing your Backer T, we'll give you free stuff.

"Sugar Daddy/Momma" :: In return for your awesomeness, you will receive a custom 6061-TC Aluminum iPhone 4/4S case, laser engraved with the Rotao "Backer" insignia. In addition, you will receive autographed art, access to all future Rotao content, and your name in the game credits under the heading "Sugar Daddy" or "Sugar Momma".

"Beyond Beta" :: Exclusive access to incremental development versions with the opportunity to work with the developers to provide creative and technical input on the first full chapter of game content!  Your name will appear in the final game credits thanks to your help and influence.  In addition, you'll receive all of the above rewards.

"Eternal Payback" :: Do you have an arch nemesis that you want to outwit once and for all?  Can you think of any better payback than to subject them to eternal torment by tens of thousands of gamers?  Work with the development team to accomplish this goal and prove your timeless superiority.  In addition, you'll receive lifetime Rotao content on all published platforms, the Rotao Backer T, and the custom 6061-TC Aluminum iPhone 4/4S case.

"Eternal Infamy" :: Do you have a higher than average opinion of yourself?  Perhaps your own theme song?  We believe you deserve to immortalize yourself as the hero or villain (or other key character) of a popular video game.  Work with the development team to accomplish this goal and prove your timeless superiority.  In addition, you'll receive lifetime Rotao content on all published platforms, the Rotao Backer T, and the custom 6061-TC Aluminum iPhone 4/4S case.
